Shockwave:



Shockwave had finished.  A solar energy collecting machine.  But he would 
have to keep attacks at a low.  To much...may be costly.  Activating his 
internal long range scanners, he looked for an ample oppertunity to use 
energy, forcing him to test his device.

"Ah, the fighting has broke out once more at the Ark.  I will engage.  But I 
must be more careful, this time." he said, walking out of the ship.  
Transforming to his space fighter mode, he launched into the air, heading for 
the Ark.
